response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to own it for $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and aligns closely with the perceived value of $1,000,000 that you attribute to it. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful transaction. Should you have any questions or need further details, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
